title: "Presentation template"
subtitle: "WS 2025/26"
author: "Tim Overkamp"
bibliography: references.bib
csl: ieee-access.csl
format:
  revealjs:
    multiplex: true
    embed-resources: true
    navigation-mode: linear
    transition: slide
    transition-speed: fast
    auto-animate-duration: 0.2
    auto-animate-easing: ease-out
    slide-number: h.v
    css: custom.css
    include-after-body:
      - text: |
          <script>
          (function() {
            var isSpeaker = window.location.href.includes('-speaker.html') || window.location.search.includes('speaker');
            if (isSpeaker) document.body.classList.add('is-speaker');
            if (!isSpeaker) return;
            
            function init() {
              Reveal.configure({ showNotes: true });
              
              var timer = document.createElement('div');
              timer.id = 'speaker-timer';
              timer.textContent = '00:00';
              document.body.appendChild(timer);
              
              var start = Date.now();
              setInterval(function() {
                var s = Math.floor((Date.now() - start) / 1000);
                var m = Math.floor(s / 60);
                timer.textContent = (m < 10 ? '0' : '') + m + ':' + (s % 60 < 10 ? '0' : '') + (s % 60);
              }, 1000);
            }
            
            if (Reveal.isReady()) init(); else Reveal.on('ready', init);
          })();
          </script>
      - text: |
          <div id="scroll-nav">
            <button onclick="Reveal.prev()">↑</button>
            <button onclick="Reveal.next()">↓</button>
          </div>
